snippet.title: Robot DIR Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
An young robot wake up after long years on stand by mode and is adopted by a family of hedgehogs. They used to play hide-and-seek in the abandoned factories of the town during all day. But one day, they were attacked by some mysterious shadow characters who took away with them all his family.
Now it is up to you to take DIR through this epic adventure across amazing worlds and more than 60 levels to help him to find his beloved family.

Subscribe our channel to receive free Robot DIR walkthroughs!

Android: http://bit.ly/robotdir
iOS: http://bit.ly/robotdir-ios

Robot DIR Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/RobotDir
Like our Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/FrozenLogicStudios
Follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/frozen_logic
http://www.frozenlogicstudios.com
